column4: cn any one give me the links 2 downloads software 4 ubuntu....wine hq
CN ANY ONE GIVE ME THE LINKS 2 DOWNLOAD SOFTWARE 4 UBUNTU....WINE HQ
please don't use caps
the channel #winehq will help you with wine, the downloads for ubuntu are controlled through the ubuntu package manager system->administration->synaptic menu
please expand on "not working"
cn u help me
you've not explained what you mean by not working
how are you starting it ?
HOW did you start it
no synpatic
do you know how to open a terminal window ?
open a terminal and do "sudo apt-get update" what happens ?
did it ask you for a password when you did it
when you launch synaptic from system->administration->synaptic menu, does it ask for a password ?
ok - try this. "gksudo /usr/bin/synaptic" what happens ?
sorry - "gksudo /usr/sbin/synaptic"
Hmmmmm so there is nothing wrong with your access system
I don't think so, something is wrong with how the menu is launching it. one moment please
remove ~/.Xauthority - reboot then try it, it should work

rm ~/.Xauthority
2009-10-07T14:21:00.000Z	ikonia	rakesh_	reboot and you should be fine
2009-10-07T14:23:00.000Z	ikonia	rakesh_	you won't see anything - restart your machine and you should be good to go
2009-10-07T14:30:00.000Z	ikonia	rakesh_	it automatcially shuts down, or powers off ?
